statements: UPDATE encrypted_data SET name='John Doe', address='123 Main St', credit_card_number='1234-5678-9012-3456' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE encrypted_data SET credit_card_number='9876-5432-1098-7654', address='456 Elm St', name='Jane Smith' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE encrypted_data SET name = 'John Doe', address = '123 Main St', credit_card_number = '1234567890123456', encrypted_data = NULL WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE encrypted_data SET address = '456 Elm St', credit_card_number = '9876543210987654', encrypted_data = 'Some encrypted content', name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET order_total = 50.75, order_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE order_id = 100;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', encrypted_customer_data = E'\\xDEADBEEF' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET order_date = '2022-01-15', order_total = 100.50, encrypted_order_details = 'This is a test order' WHERE order_id = 101;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE sensitive_data SET encrypted_data='newdata' WHERE user_id=3 AND data_type='credit_card';
UPDATE users SET password='new_password' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE sensitive_data SET encrypted_data='12345' WHERE user_id=1 AND data_type='credit_card';
UPDATE customers SET customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET unit_price = 25.99, in_stock = 50 WHERE product_id = 5;

UPDATE products SET in_stock = 100, unit_price = 25.99 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number='123-456-7890', email='newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=19.99, product_name='New Product' WHERE product_id=5;
UPDATE customers SET email='updated_email@example.com', phone_number='+1234567890' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=55.99, product_name='Updated Product Name' WHERE product_id=5;
